content.description: Self Aware Cacti stand starts on the eastern face of Stetson Aretes and follows the grippy Arete to the topout. Please be aware of the Self Aware Cacti in the fall zone to your lieback left.

Keep Those Fancy Slippers On starts on the north face and the internal arete/dihedral as a stand start. While they are essentially the same problem run two laps for notably different beta (stay on left half of the face exiting the notch high left and then stay on the right half going directly up).Both variations are about the same difficulty but feel much different in body position and technique.
content.location: North side of Stetson Aretes boulder which is NW of the corner of here the NS DMZ fenceline meets the EW fenceline. After crossing 1000 Foot Canyon and Jurassic Park turn WNW and you should come over some a ridge with some large slopey boulders and a grass flat should be to your WNW. Under a small tree by a few pristine cacti sits Stetson Aretes.

content.description:
Stetson Aretes sit in a grassy flat just WNW of the 1000 Foot Canyon / Jurassic Park areas which is NW of where the DMZ fence turns west.  

  The Stetson Aretes boulder is slightly shaded as a tree grows on its west flank. There are two main problems - one on the north face and one on the east face.
